totalExpenditure.description: Total amount of all moneys expended for lobbying activities in 1995 excluding living and travel

itemizedExpenditures.description: Name of any legislative or executive official to whom or for whose benefit, on any one occasion, an expenditure in excess of $56 was made

certification.statement: Under penalties of false affirmation, I certify that the above report is a true, expended for the purpose of lobbying during the indicated calendar year.
